index_description: We are located in Sodayo, Mino City, along National Route 156. Overlooking the clear Nagara River, nearby you will find Ogura Park and the Mino Bridge, a designated Important Cultural Property. In season, many people enjoy barbecues and camping on the Mino Bridge riverbed. If you wish, you can enjoy salt-grilled Gujo sweetfish caught by the owner.
facility_1f_desc: Kitchen, counter, and tables are available. Please feel free to use them. No meals are provided, but the open kitchen allows you to cook. Bringing your own food and drinks is also allowed. Private rental is available for parties with friends.
facility_2f_desc: Total 6 rooms (3 Japanese-style, 3 Western-style). Toilets and baths are shared.
pricing_infant_note: * Infants (up to 5 years old) sleeping with parents without bedding are
pricing_payment_text: Please pay in cash upon arrival.
index_rooms_empty: Room information is currently being prepared.
calendar_note_red: * Red dates are fully booked. Tap a date to set it as check-in.
book_error_lock: We are currently experiencing high traffic and could not complete your request. Please try again later.
book_error_taken: We are sorry, but someone else just booked this room. Please try different dates.
book_error_invalid: Invalid booking information. Please start over.
book_error_dates: Check-out date must be after check-in date.

book_error_capacity: The capacity for this room is %s. Number of guests exceeded.
info_pricing_child: Child Rate (Junior high school and under): 2,500 yen (Bring your own bedding)
info_pricing_infant: * Infants (up to 5 years old) sleeping with parents without bedding are free.
info_pricing_payment: * Please pay in cash upon arrival.
info_checkin_in: Check-in: From 15:00 (Please call us if arriving after 20:00)
info_checkin_note: * The guesthouse may be unattended during the day or night when there are no guests. Please call us before coming.
info_booking_1: Please book via this site or phone. (Phone inquiries: 8:00 - 20:00)
info_booking_2: Please inform us of the date and number of guests (by gender).
info_booking_3: Walk-ins are possible, but advance booking is recommended.
info_booking_4: Please contact us early for group rentals.
info_cancel_desc: Please contact us early for changes or cancellations to avoid inconvenience to other guests.
info_cancel_policy_3: Previous day, same day, no show: 100%
info_cancel_policy_note: * For whole-house rentals and peak seasons (GW, Obon, New Year), 50% from 7 days prior, 70% from 5 days prior, 100% from 3 days prior.
